_comment: CRO overrides for Labcorp location pages. Priority: per-slug > _default_nynj (for NY/NJ) > _default. Keys match HTML element IDs or section names.

_default.ad_subheadline: The blood work your doctor should order but doesn't.
_default.cta_subheadline: Most physicals check 15-20 things and call it thorough. Superpower runs over 100 - heart, thyroid, hormones, vitamins, metabolic, inflammation - so nothing slips through the cracks.
_default.testimonial_quote: My annual blood work came back 'normal.' Superpower found a heart risk marker my doctor never tested, a borderline thyroid problem, low vitamin D, and early signs of insulin resistance. Four things that would have gone undetected for years.
_default.testimonial_result: 4 health issues found that standard blood work missed

_default_nynj.ad_subheadline: The blood work your doctor should order but doesn't.
_default_nynj.cta_subheadline: Most physicals check 15-20 things and call it thorough. Superpower runs over 90 - heart, thyroid, hormones, vitamins, metabolic, inflammation - so nothing slips through the cracks.
